    • readDataBase

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> readDataBase​(java.lang.String dbName)
      Reads the database with the specified name. The data is stored in comma seperated value(CSV) format, in a .txt file (text file database was one of the requirements). This method also handles parsing the CSV in to an ArrayList of Maps between the column name and the particular item.
      Parameters:
      dbName -
      Returns:

    • removeEntry

      public boolean removeEntry​(java.lang.String colName, java.lang.String compareWith)
      Removes a row in the database, the location of which is determined by what value it has in it's column. For example, colName could be id and compareWith could be 4, to remove the row with the id 4.
      Parameters:
      colName -
      compareWith -
      Returns:
